titleStmt.title: Eliosto libidinoso described in two bookes: vvherein their imminent dangers are declared, who guiding the course of their life by the compasse of affection, either dash their ship against most dangerous shelues, or else attaine the hauen with extreame preiudice. Written by Iohn Hynd.
titleStmt.author: Hind, John, fl. 1596-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Valentine Simmes, and are to be sold by Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
